claim.text: The use of audio features in volatility prediction is statistically significant for n=3 only.
claim.exact_quote: HTML delivers its most accurate short-term predictions using text+audio, but its most accurate long-term predictions come from the text-only version.

evidence.evidence_text: The text+audio version of HTML has lower MSE values for short-term predictions, but not for long-term predictions.
evidence.limitations: The claim is only supported for n=3, not for other time-periods.

claim.text: The hierarchical transformer architecture provides improvements over LSTM-based models.
